name: Cosmic Racer
overview: An AMOS based shooter. In Cosmic Racer, you travel to ten planets to rid them of bandits. Each planet has two zones (shown in third-person perspective): Time zones must be completed in as little time as possible. Bandit zones must be rid of four bandits. After you completed both zones, a sequence in an asteroid field follows as you travel to the next planet (show in top-down view).
